meta.name: keywords
meta.content: publi, tuition free, school, charter school, alternative, eduaction, arts, art based, students, arts integrated, collaborative, design, success, college, career, social justice, project based, competitive, Phoenix, Arizona

meta.name: description
meta.content: Create Academy is a public, tuition-free charter school with 501(c)(3) status that opened in central Phoenix. Through an arts integrated curriculum anchored in project-based learning, Create Academy will prepare all students for success in college, career, and society by teaching students to collaboratively invent, design, and implement creative solutions that address societal problems and injustices.

div.p: Through an arts integrated curriculum anchored in project-based learning, Create Academy prepares all students for success in college, career, and society by teaching students to collaboratively invent, design, and implement creative solutions that address societal problems and injustices.

span.strong: Facts and Studies Supporting an Arts Integrated Approach

p.span: Arts Integrated programs of study are found to increase student achievement, decrease discipline problems, and increase student attendance across multiple schools and school districts
Students exposed to an arts-rich education are more likely to successfully complete college, find meaningful employment, and be civically engaged in their communities
Creativity is cited by CEOs across the globe as most important character trait

div.a: Letter-to-Parents-regarding-School Closure for the Remainder of the Year
